reporter_caption.center: WEST SHORE R.R. CO. v. BD. PUB. UTILITY COMMRS., 116 N.J.L. 192 (1936)

caption.center: THE WEST SHORE RAILROAD COMPANY ET AL., APPELLANTS, v. THE BOARD OF PUBLIC
UTILITY COMMISSIONERS OF THE STATE OF NEW JERSEY ET AL. (PUBLIC SERVICE

opinion.posture: On appeal from the Supreme Court, whose opinion is printed in13 N.J. Mis. R. 180.
opinion.attorneys:
For the appellants, Wall, Haight, Carey Hartpence.
For the respondents, John A. Bernhard, William H. Speer andCharles S. Straw.
opinion.opinion_text:
The judgment under review herein should be affirmed, for the reasons expressed in the opinion delivered by Mr. Justice Heher in the Supreme Court.
For affirmance — THE CHANCELLOR, CHIEF JUSTICE, LLOYD, CASE. BODINE, DONGES, HETFIELD, DEAR, WELLS, WOLFSKEIL, RAFFERTY, JJ. 11.
For reversal — None.Page 193
